prompts: Create a Pokemon that resembles a delicious dessert with vibrant colors and a cheerful face.
Imagine a creature that combines elements of fruit and cake, ideal for a whimsical setting.
Design a Pokemon inspired by apples and sweets, with a playful and friendly demeanor.
Generate a character that embodies the essence of a cozy bakery, bright and inviting.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like a fusion of a fruit and a cake, with fun colors.
Make a Pokemon that has a round, soft body and elements that resemble a dessert topping.
I want a Pokemon that appears sweet and friendly, with a design that features multiple shades of orange.
